message: minimum value criteria for this field is not met
moreInformation: Minimum value/length rule violated, please check the rule and provide proper value

message: maximum value criteria for this field is not met
moreInformation: Maximum value/length rule violated, please check the rule and provide proper value

message: length is wrong
moreInformation: Length or value is not matching with the rule, please check the rule and provide proper value

message: field is mandatory
moreInformation: Data for mandatory field skipped, please check the rule and provide proper value

message: can"t be set
moreInformation: Data found for absent field, please check the rule and skip the appropriate field

message: is not included in the list
moreInformation: Data do not match with the allowed values, please check the rule and provide proper value

message: is reserved
moreInformation: Data should not match with the restricted values, please check the rule and provide proper value

message: is not a number
moreInformation: Given value is not a number, please check the rule and provide proper value

message: is not an integer
moreInformation: Given value is not a number or contains decimal value, please check the rule and provide proper value

message: unknown pattern - change the input pattern
moreInformation: Data provided do not adhere to the allowed pattern, please check the rule and provide proper value

message: duplicate value exist - data already exists
moreInformation: Given value is not unique, please check the rule and provide proper value

message: no entry found for target model
moreInformation: Data provided violates the relations defined on the model, please check the relation rule and provide proper value

message: custom validation rules violated
moreInformation: Data provided violates inter-model validation rule, please check the rule and provide proper value

message: enum name given in enumtype sub-property is not valid
moreInformation: Model name given in enumtype property does not match with any model name

message: is not valid enum
moreInformation: Enum value should be valid, please check the enum list and provide proper value

message: has invalid characters. Only a-z and A-Z are allowed.
moreInformation: Name provided is having unwanted characters, please check the rule and provide proper value

message: No target model found.Please define the model first
moreInformation: Model you are trying to access is not defined, check your data and define the required Model first

message: Foreign key can"t be blank
moreInformation: Value for the specified foreign key is missing, check the rule and provide proper data

message: OTP expired please try again
moreInformation: OTP expired please try again

message: OTP not matching, please try again
moreInformation: OTP not matching, please try again

message: OTP already used, please try again
moreInformation: OTP already used, please try again

message: is not valid reference code

message: Ref code name given in refcodetype sub-property is not valid
moreInformation: Model name given in refcodetype property does not match with any model name

message: validateWhen condition is not a valid expression
moreInformation: Expression provided for the validateWhen condition is not a valid expression

message: refWhere clause is not a valid mustache template
moreInformation: Mustache template provided for refWhere clause of reference type oeValidation is not a valid template

message: expression clause is not a valid expression
moreInformation: Expression provided for the expression clause of custom type oeValidation is not a valid expression

message: property name cannot be isValid
moreInformation: One of the property in model's definition has an invalid name

message: insufficient data
moreInformation: Autoscoped values not found the model

moreInformation: Cannot pass autoscoped values in payload

message: script injection
moreInformation: Cannot have script tag in this field

message: duplicate value exist - a given value of case insensitive data already exists
moreInformation: Given value is not unique case insensitive, please check the rule and provide proper value

message: Cross model property reference should be valid, please check the cross model property value and provide proper value
moreInformation: Given value is not valid cross model property, please check the rule and provide proper value

message: Access Denied
moreInformation: Data Access Control does not allow access

message: Data Access Error

message: Data Access Error Custom Code

message: Mustache expression or data is not valid
moreInformation: Mustache expression provided in the model definition is not valid or the data posted for it is invalid.
